sentences: Michelle Courtens (born 3 August 1981), performing as Michelle, is a Dutch singer, who is known from her performance in the Eurovision Song Contest 2001.
She was born in Venray, The Netherlands.
On 2 March 2001 Michelle competed in the final of the Dutch National Song Contest, with the alternative pop song "Out on My Own".
She won the final with a score of 84, 30 points more than the contestant finishing second.
This meant she could go to the Eurovision Song Contest 2001 in Copenhagen, Denmark.
